overview_of_class: This course will provide an introduction to health psychology. The course will provide exposure to topics including stress and coping, personality and health, social support and health, health behaviors, and adjustment to chronic illnesses.
name: Health Psychology
title: WCAS PSYCH 248-0-20 Health Psychology
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Psychology students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will provide an introduction to health psychology. The course will provide exposure to topics including stress and coping, personality and health, social support and health, health behaviors, and adjustment to chronic illnesses.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Taylor, S. E. (2017). Health Psychology (10th Edition). McGraw-Hill. ISBN: 978-1259870477

Social & Behavioral Sciences Distro Area

Attendance at 1st class mandatory
